mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.image_path AS "imagePath", a.type AS "type", a.sort AS "sort", a.state AS "state", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.image_link_url AS "imageLinkUrl", a.begin_date AS "beginDate", a.end_date AS "endDate", a.content AS "content", a.media_type AS "mediaType", a.link_type as "linkType"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ad_ad a where a.type = 0 and a.state =1 and a.channel=2 and a.media_type = 0 and NOW() between begin_date and end_date order by a.sort limit 5

SELECT
FROM ad_ad a left join ad_ad_group_conn agc on a.id =agc.ad_id left join ad_group g on agc.group_id = g.id where a.state =1 and g.id = (select u.group_num from ad_user u where u.id=#{userId})
and a.type in (2,5)
and a.type in (3,7)
and a.type in (8,10)
and a.type in (2,4)
and a.type in (3,6)
and a.type in (8,9)
and a.media_type = 0 and a.channel=2 and NOW() between begin_date and end_date order by a.sort limit 8

SELECT a.image_path AS "imagePath", a.image_link_url AS "imageLinkUrl" FROM ad_ad a left join ad_ad_group_conn agc on a.id =agc.ad_id left join ad_group g on agc.group_id = g.id where a.state =1 and g.id = #{groupId} and a.title = #{title} and a.type = 11 order by a.create_date limit 1

SELECT a.image_path AS "imagePath", a.image_link_url AS "imageLinkUrl", a.title as "title" FROM ad_ad a LEFT JOIN ad_ad_group_conn agc ON agc.ad_id = a.id WHERE agc.group_id = #{groupId } AND a.type = #{type } AND a.state = 1 AND a.begin_date < NOW() AND a.end_date > NOW() ORDER BY a.create_date DESC LIMIT 1
